name: Abhorrent Abode
description:
Warning: Loud noises and cheap jumpscares.
You seek refuge in an abandoned mansion while being chased by a mob for felonies, but little do you know; the mansion is haunted.

Made in a little over 10 days for Spoopy Jam 3.

Used SynthesizerV for the singing ghost. Be sure to check it out here:

https://dreamtonics.com/en/synthesizerv/

Attribution:

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4567-unnatural-situation
